reviews.comments: Muy buena atención del anfitrion.  Lo que se ofreció  para alquilar, se cumplió.  Excelente estadia
Muy buen lugar para alojarse. Cómodo, céntrico y con avenidas cercanas para transporte.

Excelente hospitalidad por parte de Gerardo, disponible y colaborativo al 100%. La ubicación es excelente también y el departamento muy amplio. Lo único malo que tuvimos fue la vecina de arriba que hacía mucho ruido desde temprano, pero quizás para alguien de sueño muy pesado eso no sea un problema.
El departamento es muy amplio y cómodo,tal cual como se ve en la publicación. Muy bien ubicado. Gerardo muy amable , siempre atento a nuestras preguntas.
Muy buena experiencia... Gerardo un gran anfitrión

Excelente ubicación céntrica pero sin ser ruidoso, con cochera cómoda a una cuadra, dormitorios amplios, living gigante al igual que la cocina que tenía de todo para cocinar. El anfitrión SÚPER gentil, comprometido, siempre contestando nuestras preguntas y ayudándonos 100% recomendable!!!!
Excelente todo, muy buena comunicación con Gerardo.

Todo genial, el depto es lo que se publica. Por dentro todo muy bien iluminado, buena calefacción. Espacioso, fuimos con mis hijos y tenían espacio de sobra. Lavarropas. Muy cerca del centro. Gerardo muy atento nos explicó todo. Volveremos.
Departamento céntrico, muy cómodo y cuenta con cochera . Sin dudas regresaría.
Todo perfecto en el departamento de gerardo!

Departamento muy bien ubicado, espacioso y amplio. Ideal para recorrer el centro a pie. El edificio es antigüo pero el departamento esta muy bien mantenido, no tiene luz natural pero las luminarias hace que no se note. Gerardo es un excelente anfitrión siempre dispuesto y en permanente contacto. El barrio es tranquilo

La estadia fue excelente. Gerardo nos dio todas las indicaciones que le pedimos, el departamento es muy cómodo y cumple con todo lo que el anuncio detalla. Muy recomendable! La zona es muy buena tambien porque permite llegar fácilmente a todos los puntos de la ciudad, ya sea caminando o a través de un medio de trasporte público. Lo recomendamos!

Departamento ampliamente confortable ,en un lugar tranquilo y a pasos de la peatonal y la plaza de la (URL HIDDEN) atencion de Gerardo es excelente ,tenes todo  a mano ,ya sea para comer afuera o abastecerte de lo necesario.Pasamos un fin de semana muy lindo

Hermoso departamento en una zona agradable de Mendoza, cercana al centro histórico y cívico pero muy tranquila. En este caso sólo me alojé yo, pero tiene lugar para cuatro personas cómodas. Es amplio y con todo lo necesario para cocinar, ropa de cama, buena ducha, wifi, etc. Gerardo fue también muy amable en recibirme a la madrugada y siempre estuvo disponible para la comunicación. Lo recomiendo.

La casa es muy linda está bien equipada, estaba todo limpito y preparado para nuestra llegada, queda   a pasos de todo. Disfrutamos mucho de la casa, de que sea amplia,  porque nos quedamos bastante ahi ya que el clima estaba feo. Gerardo es muy buen anfitrión, tanto sea para tomarse el tiempo para recomendar qué visitar y tener los folletos que necesites  como por el hecho de estar siempre atento y conectado por teléfono siempre que se precise. muy recomendable!

Todo 10 puntos. El departamento es exacto como se ve en las fotos. Muy amplio y acogedor. Cocina bien equipada. Perfectamente calefaccionado. Gerardo fue muy amable en todo momento. Cuando llegamos ya estaba esperandonos y se tomó el tiempo para recomendarnos bodegas y paseos, los cuales hicimos y nos gustaron mucho. 
La ubicación es excelente también. 
Lo único negativo: es contrafrente y le falta un poco de luz solar. Pero lo suple con lo encantador del departamento. 
Sin dudarlo volvería. Un 10!

Pasamos unos hermosos días en Mendoza, somos una familia de 5 miembros. 
El departamento se ajusta 100% a lo ofrecido, las fotos son exactas!
Gerardo hizo todo lo que estaba a su alcance para satisfacer nuestras necesidades, también cuando se presentó algún percance.
El departamento se ajusta perfectamente para una familia con niños, ya que está totalmente equipado y es muy amplio.
La ubicación es perfecta, a un paso de todo!

We had a great time in Mendoza. We are a party of 5. Great Location in Mendoza´s downtown, close to everything!
The apartment was as expected, the pictures shown are 100% accurate.
Gerardo was very kind and offered his help any time we needed.
The apartment is the perfect spot for a family!

La experiencia fue muy satisfactoria. Gerardo fue muy atento y siempre estuvo disponible para lo que necesitáramos, al recibirnos nos indicó sitios de interés para visitar. El departamento es excelente, está ubicado a pocas cuadras del microcentro y cuenta con todas las comodidades necesarias para que la estadía sea perfecta.

Pasamos una semana en el depto de Gerardo. El depto muy cómodo y muy bien ubicado sobre todo si como nosotros fuimos sin auto. Muy amplio , bien calefaccionado , muy limpio. Pasamos unos días muy lindos y recomendamos repetir  nuestra experiencia. Gerardo nos atendió muy bien y nos acosejó lugares para visitar, para comer,etc. Nos sentimos en familia.

Estuvimos muy cómodos en el depto, la verdad que es muy amplio y está muy bien equipado. La cocina super completa, tiene todo lo necesario y más para cocinar y preparar el desayuno. Gerardo es muy amable y nos dió indicaciones y recomendaciones sobre las actividades y los transportes, además nos recibió con un vino tinto para arrancar el tour. La ubicación es muy cómoda y a mano para moverse a los principales sitios turísticos de la ciudad. Sin duda lo recomendamos y lo volveríamos a elegir.

Hola! Estuvimos en casa de Gerardo del 3 al 6 de diciembre. Fue una muy grata estadía.
Gerardo nos recibió perfectamente en cuanto llegamos del aeropuerto, y también fue impecable al momento de presentarse cuando debíamos entregar el depto.
El departamento era tal cual aparecía en las fotos. Nosotros éramos 4 personas que nos ubicamos perfectamente en los 2 dormitorios que tenía, con toda la ropa de cama y toallas especificadas.
También la cocina estaba muy completa como para prepararnos el desayuno y comidas sencillas
La ubicación era excelente a muy pocas cuadras del centro y de Plaza Independencia.
Un anfitrión muy amable y muy atento.
Lo pasamos muy bien. GRACIAS GERARDO

La  descripción era correcta.  el departamento muy cómódo   estrcutural y funcionalmente., bien equipado .El  barrio tranquilo con muchas negocios cerca  y rodeado de playas de estacionamiento.
Gerardo nos recibió  muy bien , muy cálidoy  estuvo a disposición.

HOLA BUENISIMA LA ATENCION ENCANTADOS QUEDAMOS FELICITACIONES POR ESO, LAS FOTOS ERAN CON EXACTITUD LO QUE HABIAMOS VISTO COMODISIMO EL LUGAR Y SUPER AGRADABLE. EL SECTOR DE LA CIUDAD PERFECTO TODO A MANO TODO CERCA. GRACIAS
Gerardo muy atento con nosotros y muy preocupado por que nos sintiéramos a gusto en su departamento, muy espacioso y con todo lo necesario para una cómoda estadía, recomendable.

Gerardo es un gran anfitrión, nos hizo sentir en casa desde el primer minuto. El departamento es tal como se muestra en las fotos. Es muy céntrico, cerca de bares y restaurantes, muy limpio y con todas las necesidades para sentirse en casa. Recomiendo mucho su departamento.
Excelente lugar, cómodo, tranquilo y acogedor. Increíble la atención y amabilidad de Gerardo, recomendado para una excelente estancia en Mendoza.
Todo estuvo en orden. Buena ubicación. Gerardo nos atendió muy bien. El departamento está muy bien equipado.

Muy buena experiencia, el lugar es bonito, amplio, con cocina y baño bien equipados, tal como las describen las fotos. Es un lugar céntrico con buena ubicación y seguro. Gerardo es muy amable, da muy buenas indicaciones y es puntual en los horarios acordados. Excelente experiencia.

El departamento es muy lindo y Gerardo y Jorgelina son muy amables y  flexibles con el horario. Llegamos muy tarde y no era un problema. La ubicación es ideal, en el centro y muy cerca a todos los bares y restaurantes. Tuvimos algunos problemitas pequeños con el inodoro y el fregadero, que no funcionaron muy bien por un rato, pero al fin todo terminó bien. También, casi no hay luz natural, pero las luces en el departamento son muy brillantes. Con todo, nos disfrutamos mucho, y    definitivamente recomiendo este departamento.

Gerardo was very helpful with information about Mendoza. His place is nice and the location is perfect. The kitchen has everything you need. It is a very spacious apartment. I highly recommend this place.

Has a fabulous time. This apt is in middle of everything. Days at Vineyards and evenings in local restaurants in walking distance. Many of the plazas are 5-10 minutes walk. We had a great time. Thanks Gerardo.

Gerardo is a great host. These are certainly basic accommodations, but for a quick trip to Mendoza where you are spending most of your time at wineries and exploring the town, it was a good value for the money we paid.
Le quartier est animé plein centre.  L'appartement est proche de la grande avenue San Martin, des commerces et restaurants. Merci à Gerardo à  sa réactivité lors de notre arrivée du chili.

O apto é amplo, boa cozinha, bons quartos e sala com 2 ambientes, tudo limpo e bem cuidado. Fica localizado junto ao "centro comercial", e pode-se fazer tudo caminhando (restaurantes, supermercados, bares, cambio,etc). Gerardo é um excelente anfitrião.

O apartamento é limpo e organizado. Tem diversas comodidades e os colchões são bons. Gerardo é muito cordial e nos deu várias dicas sobre a cidade, restaurantes, supermercados, etc. O apartamento é bem localizado, perto da peatonal e das principais avenidas comerciais.
Great location!

O apartamento é grande, bem dividido e equipado. Tinha probleminhas na pintura. O prédio é antigo e mau conservado, mas é seguro. Está a 4 quadras da peatonal e se encontram os serviços fundamentais bem próximos. Gerardo é muito amável, solícito e prestativo.
Ótima localização e apartamento super equipado!!

Espaço aconchegante e muito bem localizado!
O anfitrião é muito atencioso e cuidadoso!
Adoramos a estadia!
Gerardo was a great communicator and provided lots of tips and advice on what to do in Mendoza. It was a pleasure staying there!

Great host and location. There are a lot of restaurants and shopping within walking distance. There is a grocery store close by if you’re interested. A couple of good cafes very close by for breakfast. Gerardo was always very quick to respond to any questions or concerns.

Gerardo nos recebeu super bem e nos ajudou com dicas da cidade. O apartamento é ótimo, próximo às avenidas principais e ao centro. Dá pra fazer tudo a pé pela cidade. Em frente ao prédio tem um local delicioso que o Gerardo nos indicou com ótimo custo benefício para almoçar! Super recomendo! 

O apartamento é ótimo para curtir a cidade e super confortável!!! Adoramos e recomendamos.

Ótimo apartamento, bem decorado, confortável e equipado, igual ao que aparece nas fotos e satisfez todas as minhas necessidades no período que estive em Mendoza. Possui localização um pouco afastada do centro, mas fica a algumas quadras de mercados, casas de cambio, ótimos cafés e bares e das principais praças do centro da cidade.
Quanto ao Gerardo, o dono, excelente anfitrião, muito preocupado com turistas, um amigo realmente... me ajudou pro toda a minha estada e quando retornar a cidade, certamente irei novamente no seu apartamento.
Possui ótimas referencias, principalmente a Jazmine que organiza passeios para  as principais vinícolas, que também recomendo.
Viihtyisä asunto, kätevä sijainti, erinomainen hintalaatu-suhde. Omistaja puhuu hyvää englantia, on erittäin ystävällinen ja antoi paljon tietoa ja vinkkejä Mendozan päiviämme varten!

Gerardo's place was great! Very spacious, a nice living  room and clean kitchen with all the necessary new appliances. There isn't a lot of natural sunlight, but there is plenty of ceiling light and lamps in the apartment. The location is great, 2 blocks off Plaza España and 4 from Plaza Independencia. Gerardo is helpful, welcoming and speaks great English.

Gerardo foi um excelente anfitrião, nos recebeu super bem explicando tudo do apartamento, deu dicas de passeios e de como andar pela cidade...nos indicou uma guia que nos levou as bodegas por um bom preço. O apartamento é grande e bem equipado as roupas de cama limpas e organizadas. Um comentário importante é que a entrada do predio é aparentemente estranha a principio mas é um local seguro. É perto de tudo!!! Da pra fazer tudo a pé pela cidade.

Sem duvidas uma das melhores casas que fiquei durante a minha viagem, o Geraldo é extremamente gentil e atencioso, sem contar o seu esforço em falar em português! A cidade é maravilhosa e a localização do apartamento e perfeita!! Super indico e com toda certeza voltarei!
Excelente localização. As fotos demonstram exatamente o que é o apartamento. Foi excelente a estadia. Voltarei em breve.

O apto. é simples mas perfeitamente equipado, com ar condicionado, tomadas com adaptadores para recarga de celulares, cozinha equipada, sala espaçosa, e vinho como cortesia . Gerardo é um anditrião presente, nos recebeu ao chegarmos, e veio se despedir . Ficamos satisfeitas com a escolha, e recomendamos.

Gerardo was a fantastic host. He was very flexible about our check-in and out times, met us at the apartment to give us a map and recommendations about the area, and told us to message him if we needed help even after our Airbnb stay was over. We felt extremely welcomed and well taken care of.

The apartment itself is spacious and cheery. The location is also very near to the main plaza in Mendoza and seems quite safe.

Der Aufenthalt in Gerados Appartment ist sehr zu empfehlen! Er ist sehr zuvorkommend und hat uns bei allen Fragen sehr unterstützt. Die Lage ist einfach perfekt, da man alles ohne Probleme zu Fuß erreichen kann. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und empfehlen ihn deswegen gerne weiter!

Um ótimo local para se hospedar, espaçoso, confortável e com muito boa localização. O anfitrião é muito solicito, tem excelente conhecimento sobre o que se pode fazer na cidade além de uma pessoa muito amigável. Em uma próxima oportunidade em Mendoza, certamente farei contato.

Gerardo was a great host and the apartment was perfect. It was bright and cleanly, and the shower had great pressure! He gave us a good recommendation to eat at Silla 14 as well for breakfast, which was one of our favorite meals. Overall easy experience and great apartment.

The place was perfect! Great location in a quiet area but close walk to lots of restaurants, shops, and bars. The place was clean, had a washing machine, and air conditioning that worked great. Gerardo was so helpful and had wonderful recommendations for activities, restaurants, etc. He always messaged me back quickly and was so accommodating. One of my best Airbnb experiences and highly recommend!!

Excelente apartamento, bem equipado e muito bem localizado, próximo das avenidas principais de Mendoza. Fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Gerardo, que nos apresentou todo o apartamento e nos deu dicas sobre os locais próximos do apartamento. Além disso, fomos presenteados com uma boa garrafa de vinho. Apartamento recomendado para estadia em Mendoza.

Good air conditioning and About 8-10 blocks from anywhere you want to be in the city. 15 minute walk or 3 minute taxi ($3 USD) to Plaza Independencia. Gerardo gave a ton of suggestions for dinner, bars, etc. and responded to texts very quickly. Also started us off with a free bottle of wine! Very happy with our stay.

Gerardo's apartment is a great place to stay, walkable to any of the main attractions of downtown Mendoza, and with enough space to stretch out and be comfortable. But even better than the apartment is the service! Gerardo is a fantastic host with a good knowledge of the city and he gave us some fantastic recommendations and really helped make our trip great.
Great stay in a great place

Apartamento amplo, muito bem equipado e limpo. Excelente localização, muito próximo de tudo, supermercado, restaurantes, pontos turísticos. Não precisamos de taxi para locomoção. Uma ótima opção para quem procura um lugar em Mendoza, com certeza indicamos! Gerardo foi atencioso e bastante prestativo. Recomendo!

Notre séjour chez gerardo etait super, l'appartement est similaire aux photos et gerardo s'est montré d'une grande gentillesse à tous points de vue. Une bouteille d'accueil nous attendait ainsi qu'un petit sapin de Noël, la cuisine est tres bien équipée, vraiment nous nous sommes  sentis chez nous pour ces quelques jours de Noël. Allez y les yeux fermés.
Great location. Accommodating host!

Gerardo was a fantastic host! He was helping us plan our trip even before we arrived. Once we arrived he helped make some reservations and even suggested a private wine tour which was wonderful! He went above and beyond to help us out and make sure we had a fantastic time in Mendoza. 

The apartment is very spacious and was within walking distance of the main town centre. It was nice to be able to do some laundry and make use of the kitchen. 

Thanks again for being such a wonderful host!

Gerardo é um ótimo anfitrião, preocupado e atencioso com seus hóspedes, nos recepcionou com uma garrafa de vinho Malbec para já entrarmos no clima de Mendoza, um mimo muito agradável aos seus hóspedes.
Nos ajuda com dicas sobre a cidade e está sempre pronto e disposto a ajudar e esclarecer dúvidas.
Seu apartamento é lindo e muito confortável, com certeza voltarei a me hospedar em seu espaço.
Super recomendo!

Notre séjour s'est bien déroulé. Gerardo nous a accueilli et nous a expliqué le fonctionnement de son appartement. Il nous a également prêté un parking pour y laisser notre voiture. Bonne communication. Appartement que je recommande
this was my second stay here. the apartment is central, clean and quite big. the communication with gerardo was perfect. i absolutely recommend this place

Gerardo's apartment is in a great location. It's easy to walk to the main part of town (Plaza Independencia) and there are supermarkets and restaurants close by (Avenida Colon). Gerardo was very helpful and accommodating, especially in regards to checking-in and checking-out. The apartment is a little dark, but if you're not spending a lot of time there, it's not a big deal.

A casa de Gerardo foi uma ótima escolha em Mendoza. 
O prédio é antigo, mas o apartamento é limpo, bem cuidado é equipado com tudo que se pode precisar durante a estadia. 
Gerardo é o melhor anfitrião que já tive contato no Airbnb  Nos esperou chegar apesar de um atraso de várias horas, explicou todos os detalhes e esteve sempre disponível. Além disso ainda nos levou na rodoviária quando estávamos indo embora! 
Ficaríamos lá novamente com certeza. 
A localização é muito boa e em poucos minutos você está na Plaza Independência, a principal da cidade, ou na Peatonal Sarmiento, onde há bares, restaurantes e um comércio movimentado. 
Recomendamos muito!

The apartment location was walkable to the main restaurant area and the main downtown and plaza areas. The kitchen was fully stocked with dishes and pans so it was nice to be able to make breakfast there before our excursions. Gerardo provided great info about restaurants, laundry, supermarkets, everything we could have needed.

The location of Gerardo's apartment is perfect, very easy to walk to everywhere. Gerardo is an excellent host providing lots of local tips and help with orientation, we even received a lift from the bus station. We hope to be back in Mendoza soon.
We had a great time at the house! The place is comfortable, clean and spacious. Gerardo is very kind and helped us knowing a bit better the city of Mendoza! Loved it! Very recommended!

Gerardo's apartment was everything we (me and my girlfriend) had hoped for. It was a perfect location for our few days here in Mendoza. Gerardo welcomed us when we first arrived and offered so many tips for the area that accommodated for any type of traveler on any budget. He even gave us a welcoming bottle of local wine which was delicious! He was so flexible with accomodating our travel plans (late check-out, even though he had more guests the following day). 
     If we ever come back to this lovely city we will definitely hope to stay at Gerardo's once again!

Moretti is very friendly and helpful. Even though we arrived in the midnight, he was waiting there for us and introduced us the trip clearly. The room is clean,big and warm, and it is very convenient to go everywhere.
Gerardo was extremely helpful with providing information and recommendations in Mendoza. The apartment was beautiful, spotless and perfectly located! Definitely recommend staying here!!

Gerardo was an excellent host and his apartment was perfect for our stay in Mendoza. It is close and within walking distance of the town squares and great restaurants. Directly across the street is a wonderful restaurant, La Patrona. The apartment is spacious, the kitchen had everything we needed and Gerardo even had a bottle of wine waiting for us upon arrival. The best part of our stay was his graciousness, he took time to explain the city, show us all the restaurants and coffee shops near by. We are actually returning to Mendoza and hopefully his apartment will be available again. Thank you!

This apartment was a great fit for my stay in Mendoza with my sister.  It was a great location for walking to the restaurants and pubs.  Gerardo was an excellent host. He explained the layout of the city with a very useful map. He responded to all questions via the Airbnb app immediately as we were out and about. He even recommended excellent companies that we were able to book in wine tours and horseback riding with.
Gerardo was great, very prompt at replying back and was able to accommodate an additional guest last minute. Great value for location and place!

Gerardo was a fantastic Airbnb host during our time in Mendoza. He gave us a great introduction to the area, talking us through nearby restaurants and facilities as well as guiding us through the different wine tour options available to us in Mendoza.

The apartment is quite spacious and well located, about a block from Plaza España and a few blocks from the main restaurant area. It's a great value apartment, with a lovely kitchen and heating in every room - essential during our cold winter stay! 

I would definitely recommend Gerardo and his fab apartment for your stay in Mendoza!

Gerardo was easily the most helpful host I have ever encountered on Airbnb. He set up our wine tour with a private driver and arranged a taxi back to the airport on our departure. He also gave us an explanation and map of the city. In addition, Gerardo responded quickly to my texts when I had any questions. The apartment was very spacious and clean. It was perfect for our group of 4.
Gerardo was amazing! Had a great experience - thanks so much

Gerardo was very easy to communicate with.  He answered all our questions in minutes.  Very friendly and helpful.  The apartment was great for our trip to Mendoza.  I would highly recommend Gerardo as a host.

Fantastic apartment for 4 people.  The apartment has perfect location, is very clean and photos are accurate.  Gerardo is the best host with lots of tips about mendoza and the rest of Argentina.  We absolutely loved our stay and would recommend it to anyone!

Gerardo is a fantastic host and a top bloke! The apartment is nicely furnished and in a great location. We also had a bottle of Malbec on the table for us to enjoy during our stay. Gerardo waited for us even though we arrived late due to a flight delay and offered us a lift to the bus station for our journey to Chile! Top votes for Gerardo! Highly recommend staying here

Our host, Gerardo, met us at the apartment to greet us.  He went above and beyond giving us information about the city, things to do and places to eat.   He also stayed in contact with us throughout our stay helping us with anything we needed.
The apartment was great.  It was more than big enough for the 4 of us staying there and was equipped with everything we needed.   The location was also great.  Highly recommend staying here!

Gerardo was one of our best Air BnB hosts. 

First, he was always available and was very fast to respond to our questions on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). He took time to write us detailed answers.

Moreover, Gerardo knows Mendoza really well and provided amazing recommendations on what to do, where to eat, etc. We got better tips than those we know who stayed at other places. He even tailored his suggestions to our preferences. 

The apartment itself was clean and well equipped. Even though the location is not on the main square, it is easy to walk there and was still close to transit etc. We actually preferred the location since it allowed us to try local food spots and get a feel for the real city.

We would definitely recommend Mendoza and Gérardo's place.

무엇보다 숙소 위치가 최고다. 멘도사 시내가 작은 편이긴 하지만 어디를 가고자 마음 먹든지 충분히 가볍게 걸어서 다녀올 수 있다. 멘도사에 Vendimia 축제 기간과 맞물려 다녀왔는데 다양한 이벤트 일정과 가장 편하게 축제를 즐길 수 있는 포인트를 짚어 주는 Gerardo의 세심함이 고마웠다. 오래된 아파트인데다 특히 욕실이 조금 아쉬웠지만 가족 모두 넓고 편안하게 3박을 지냈다. 일요일 아침임에도 버스터미널로 향하는 마지막까지 배웅해주며 살뜰하게 챙겨주는 최고의 호스트이다.
Comfortable and centrally located apartment. Great communication with host. Enjoyed our stay and would recommend.

Had a great experience.  Property is accurately described and location is great.  Gerardo was very welcoming and provided fast responses to all questions and concerns.  I would be very happy to stay here again.

Gerardo was wonderful. So warm and welcoming. He makes you feel like family. He had detailed maps for us orienting us into the neighborhood for restaurants, groceries,ATMs, etc. he spent time to be sure we understood how to run things in his lovely apartment. The location is ideal   With Patrona restaurant across the street It is very convenient for a great dinner at reasonable cost close to home for the late dinner hours.

Gerardo's appartment was exactly what we were hoping for. A comfortable place to relax, very close to the centre of town and with all the facilities we miss from home. Gerardo met us at the beginning and end of our stay and was easy to contact when needed,  even arranging a taxi to the airport. I will recommend this place to anyone i know planning to stay in Mendoza

Gerardo est un hôte tout simplement impeccable !

Ultra organisé, super sympathique.
Aisément accessible durant le séjour.
Plusieurs conseils appropriés à propos des resto/café.

De plus, le logement ne pourrait pas être mieux situé pour visiter le centre-ville de Mendoza à pied. Quartier qui plus est sécuritaire.

J'y retournerais sans hésiter !

Spacious & comfortable... This unit is clean & well equipped. It is a freshly renovated unit in an older apartment block and is within easy walking distance of supermarket, ATMs, restaurants & many plazas (parks) & the mall. We are a family of five and used the trundle bed in the second bedroom for the third child in our family. The air conditioning was appreciated in the warm summer weather. We were welcomed in person despite our late arrival time  & greeted warmly with a welcome bottle of local wine.

Gerardo was a fantastic host. He was at the apartment to meet us when we arrived, gave us some great local advise on where to go to eat and options of activities we could look into during our stay - he even gave us hand drawn maps with all the important places we could possibly want to go to near the apartment! :) The apartment itself was exactly as pictured, maybe even more spacious than it looks! We were a group of 4 and had more than enough space! Beds were comfortable and everything worked well - would definitely recommend staying here if you're in Mendoza! :)

A great apartment in a great location! And an extremely thoughtful host! In addition to meeting us to check in, Gerardo left a bottle of wine and great maps with recommendations for restaurants as well as highlights and services we might need (i.e., drug store, etc.) The apartment was very comfortable and spacious. And, a week into our trip when we arrived at Gerardo's, we were very grateful for the washing machine. Due to a change in plans, we stayed in Mendoza longer than anticipated and since Gerardo's was already booked after us, we moved to a new location, which Gerardo even went out of his way to drive us over to. We even accidentally left something at the apartment and Gerardo dropped it off at the other location the next day--all this with a new baby at home. Cannot recommend this apartment and host enough!
Thanks Gerado! Great place and location. Gerado was great and even dropped us at the bus station.

This apartment had everything I needed--peace and quiet, a good location, a well-equipped kitchen, washing machine, nice bathroom, Wifi, cable TV, and charm.  I would happily stay there again.

Gerardo is the perfect host.  His English is excellent.  He met me at the door, took care of my luggage, explained everything, and left me with a really good bottle of wine.  I felt completely at home and welcomed.  There were two small things that needed to be fixed (it is an old building, which is probably why it is so quiet and solid.)  Gerardo was right there and took care of everything efficiently.

It is easy to walk to the center of town and markets.  There are buses nearby to go to the big park or out of town.  The neighborhood felt quite safe.  There is no downside here.

Gerardo was an excellent host. He picked us up from the bus station and welcomed us to his beautiful apartment. He had plenty of recommendations and even gave us a bottle of Malbec! He was more than willing to help us throughout the entire stay with anything we needed. The apartment itself is in an amazing location!

Só tenho elogios ao apartamento e ao Gerardo. O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, o que facilita muito na escolha. E o Gerardo é um ótimo anfitrião. Tivemos uma mudança no horário de chegada e o Gerardo prontamente nos recebeu antes do horário combinado. Passou várias dicas da cidade, inclusive um ótimo restaurante em frente ao prédio (Patrona). Recomendo bastante!

The apartment was spacious, wonderfully located and very clean. The building felt safe and the beds were comfortable. Gerardo was a wonderful and accommodating host, and very responsive and quick to messaging - in excellent English. He met us upon our arrival and answered our questions about nearby ATMs and cafés; and helped us with our boxes of wine upon departure. An absolute pleasure!

Gerardo was a wonderful host and went out of his way to make us feel welcome.  The location of the apartment was excellent and a block or two from restaurants and stores.  Really convenient.  The beds were comfortable and the building reasonably quiet.  I would rent there again if I returned to Mendoza.

Gerardo was super helpful giving us loads of tips on what to do in Mendoza. He even picked us up and dropped us back to the bus station. The apartment is cute with plenty of space and is in a great part of Mendoza. Quiet but near to loads of restaurants and bars. We did a tour of some winery s and they were able to pick us up from right out front of the apartment.
